channel.title: Phat Swazy's Dirrty Dancin'
channel.description:
Spinnin live from North America's sexiest city, Derek C, otherwise known as Phat Swazy spins the hottest in today's Dance/House Trance and Electro, so grab a seat, close ur eyes and feel the vibes....
Hit me up with requests, shout outs or comments at phatswazy1@podOmatic.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Who you know Phatter than Swazy?
channel.itunes:author: Phat Swazy
channel.itunes:summary:
Spinnin live from North America's sexiest city, Derek C, otherwise known as Phat Swazy spins the hottest in today's Dance/House Trance and Electro, so grab a seat, close ur eyes and feel the vibes....

item.title: SwaZy LIVE on Digital-FM.com: July 6th
item.description:
Week 2 of my new show on www.digital-fm.com ... Tune in every Second Wednesday for Phat SwaZy and Jeremy Constantine on Royalte Radio ... 

Track List:

  • Phat Swazy Intro
  • Dinka - Violet (Inpetto Remix)
  • Alex Gaudino ft Kelly Rowland - What A feeling (Hardwell Remix)
  • Montreal House Mafia -Tarantella (badabingbadaboom remix)
  • Vito V Ft. Anna Barardi - Close to You
  • Calvin Harris ft Kellis - Bounce (Original Mix)
  • Peter Gelderblom vs RHCP - Waiting 4 (Manuel De La Mare Remix)
  • Erick Morillo & Eddie Thoneick feat. Shawnee Taylor - Stronger (Tristan Garner Remix)
  • David Puentez - Melodrama Lady Gaga - Judas (Thomas Gold Remix)
  • Sander Van Doorn - KOKO (Bingo Players Remix)
  • Afrojack vs Adele - Rolling It Right (Inphinity Bootleg)
  • Martin Solveig - Hello (Michael Woods Remix)
  • Alex Sayz, Hype Jones-Never Give Up feat. Mario Vasquez (Deniz Koyu Remix)
  • Britney Spears - Hold it Against Me (Paris FZ & Simo T & King Remix)
  • Cazzi Opeia - I Belong To You (Axel Bauer & Lanford Remix)
  • Bon Jovi vs. Matisse & Sadko - Livin' On Scandinavia (Omar Andino Bootleg)
  • Avicii VS Tv Rock & Axwell Feat. Live Element - Bromance in the Air (Tristan Garner Bootleg)
  • Wolfgang Gartner vs Dirty South vs Caddy & Manny - Let the Spacejunk Go (Digital LAB Edit)
  • Dada Life - Unleash The Fucking Dada (Wallem Bros Remix)
  • LMFAO feat. Natalia Kills - Champagne Showers (R3hab Remix)
  • Lady Gaga - Born This Way (Dada Life Remix)

item.title: SwaZy LIVE on Digital-FM.com: June 29th
item.description: Hey guys here's a live mix I did on http://digital-fm.com yesterday... Perfect mix to get your long weekend started. Enjoy Track List: 1) Kaskade & Adam K - Raining (Phat SwaZy Remix) 2) David Guetta feat. Taio Cruz & Ludacris - Little Bad Girl (Fedde Le Grand) 3) Axwell - I Found You (Joe Ghost Remix) 4) Nari & Milani, Cristian Marchi feat. Shena - Take Me To The Stars (Alvaro Remix) 5) Dada Life - Unleash the F**cking Dada (Dirtyloud Remix) 6) Sisse - Dirty Hands (The Wallem Brothers Remix) 7) AC/DC - Thunderstruck (DJ Stranger & DJ Nejtrino remix) 8) Michael Jackson - Say Say say (Moonchild Bootleg) 9) Temper Traps - Eurhythmic Disposition (Eddie Thoneick Bootleg) 10) Fedde Le Grand & Ned Shepard feat. Mitch Crown - Running (Festival Remix) 11) Tristan Garner & Gregori Klosman - Bounce (Pedro Henriques Remix) 12) Matt Caseli & Danny Freakazoid - Raise Your Hands (Original Mix)(ResidentDJ.org) 13) Afrojack & David Guetta Vs. Kaskade & Digital LAB - Louder Than Empty Streets (Kaskade Mash Up) 14) Kelly Rowland - Commander (Chuckie & Neve Remix) 15) Kelis - Brave (Third Party Remix) 16) Adrian Lux Vs. Sylvia Tosun - Teenage Crime Vs. Underlying Feeling (Axwell & Henrik B Vs. Adam K & Soha Mix) 17) Johan Gielen pres. Hollis P Monroe - I'm Lonely (Redroche Remix) 18) Swedish House Mafia - Save The World (Style of the Eye Remix) 19) Pitbull ft Neyo - Give Me Everything (Jump Smokers Remix)

item.title: A Sunshine State of Mind: Spring 2011 Mix
item.description: Phat SwaZy is back with a special extended House Mix. Featuring names like Steve Angello, Avicii, Axwell, Roger Sanchez, Hardwell, Serge Devant among others, this is an hour and 20 minutes of some of the hottest records rocking the dance floors across the globe. Check it out, plus more music and news: http://wakeupswazy.wordpress.com/ Le Track List: 1) Avicii - Levels (Original Mix) 2) Nicki Minaj vs Deadmau5 - Ghosts 4 Life (Roger Sanchez Mashup) 3) Dada Life - Fight Club Is Closed (Time for Roll&Roll) [ Hardwell Remix ] 4) Alex Gaudino feat. Kelly Rowland - What A Feeling (Promise Land Remix) 5) Steve Angello Vs. Jack Is Wack - Flonko Encule (Andrew Dee Booty) 6) Tim Mason - The Moment (Steve Angello Remix) 7) Above & Beyond - Sun & Moon (Kim Fai Remix) 8) Calvin Harris vs. Moguai - We Want Your Flashback Soul (Pedro Henriques & & Digital LAB Sebgold Re-Edit) 9) Alex Metric & Steve Angello - Open your Eyes (Third Party Remix) 10) Axwell vs R.E.M - Heart is My Religion (Blake Jerrell Bootleg) 11) Nari & Milani and Cristian Marchi feat Shena - Take Me To The Stars ( Cristian Marchi & Paolo Sandrini Main Mix) 12) Serge Devant feat. Hadley - Ghost (Playmen Remix) 13) Fedde Le Grand, Sultan & Ned Shepard feat. Mitch Crown - Running (Festival Mix) 14) Matt Caseli & Danny Freakazoid - Raise Your Hands (Original Mix) 15) Flo Rida & Nicki Minaj ft David Guetta - Where Dem Girls At (Nicky Romero Remix) 16) Journey - Don't Stop Believing (Felix Voya Remix)

item.title: Dirrty Dancin' - March Madness (03/11)
item.description: Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PhatSwazy Soundcloud (Remixes): http://soundcloud.com/phatswazydj Part 1 of 2: Big Room / Progressive/ House Mix. Track List: Jean Elan ft Cosmo Klein - Feel Alive (Original Mix) Axwellvs Julie McKnight - How Soon Is Glory (Hardwell & DJ Funkadelic Mash-Up) Deep Dish - Say Hello (Adrien Mezsi, Digital Lab & Pedro Henriques Remake) iSqaure - Hey Sexy Lady - (Chris Moody Remix) Robyn - Hang With Me (Avicii's Exclusive Club Mix) Pendulum - The Island (Size Remix: AN21, Steve Angello & Max Vangeli) Britney Spears - Hold it Against Me (Adrian Lux & Nause Club Mix) Stromae - Alors On Danse (Mowgli Remix) Rebecca & Fiona - Bullets (Adrian Lux & Nause Club Mix) Eiffel 65 - Blue (Jerry Rekonius Remix Bootleg)
